name: SANCTUARY (AMR AL-AASER)
description:
project i made while attending the School of the Art Institute in 2009.
based around the theme of "sanctuary within the city"
Press space bar to boost. hold shift while colliding with objects to interact. find the cave, jump into a flying vehicle and collect the two friends. see some cool stuff maybe.
graphics are primarily posterized and manipulated photographs and stock images.
runs poorly due to using a very old version of game maker and poor resource management.

drop beneath the broken bridge to get to the cave. hold down shift until the radios break to play music.
